Deprecated API

Deprecated Classes
org.joda.time.TimeOfDay
          Use LocalTime which has a much better internal implementation and has been available since 1.3 
org.joda.time.TimeOfDay.Property
          Use LocalTime which has a much better internal implementation 
org.joda.time.YearMonthDay
          Use LocalDate which has a much better internal implementation and has been available since 1.3 
org.joda.time.YearMonthDay.Property
          Use LocalDate which has a much better internal implementation 
 

Deprecated Methods
org.joda.time.Chronology.getBuddhist()
          Use BuddhistChronology.getInstance() 
org.joda.time.Chronology.getBuddhist(DateTimeZone)
          Use BuddhistChronology.getInstance(zone) 
org.joda.time.Chronology.getBuddhistUTC()
          Use BuddhistChronology.getInstanceUTC() 
org.joda.time.Chronology.getCoptic()
          Use CopticChronology.getInstance() 
org.joda.time.Chronology.getCoptic(DateTimeZone)
          Use CopticChronology.getInstance(zone) 
org.joda.time.Chronology.getCopticUTC()
          Use CopticChronology.getInstanceUTC() 
org.joda.time.Chronology.getGJ()
          Use GJChronology.getInstance() 
org.joda.time.Chronology.getGJ(DateTimeZone)
          Use GJChronology.getInstance(zone) 
org.joda.time.Chronology.getGJUTC()
          Use GJChronology.getInstanceUTC() 
org.joda.time.Chronology.getGregorian()
          Use GregorianChronology.getInstance() 
org.joda.time.Chronology.getGregorian(DateTimeZone)
          Use GregorianChronology.getInstance(zone) 
org.joda.time.Chronology.getGregorianUTC()
          Use GregorianChronology.getInstanceUTC() 
org.joda.time.Chronology.getISO()
          Use ISOChronology.getInstance() 
org.joda.time.Chronology.getISO(DateTimeZone)
          Use ISOChronology.getInstance(zone) 
org.joda.time.Chronology.getISOUTC()
          Use ISOChronology.getInstanceUTC() 
org.joda.time.Chronology.getJulian()
          Use JulianChronology.getInstance() 
org.joda.time.Chronology.getJulian(DateTimeZone)
          Use JulianChronology.getInstance(zone) 
org.joda.time.Chronology.getJulianUTC()
          Use JulianChronology.getInstanceUTC() 
org.joda.time.LocalDate.toDateTimeAtMidnight()
          Use LocalDate.toDateTimeAtStartOfDay() which won't throw an exception 
org.joda.time.LocalDate.toDateTimeAtMidnight(DateTimeZone)
          Use LocalDate.toDateTimeAtStartOfDay(DateTimeZone) which won't throw an exception 
org.joda.time.Instant.toDateTimeISO()
          Use toDateTime() as it is identical 
org.joda.time.Instant.toMutableDateTimeISO()
          Use toMutableDateTime() as it is identical 
org.joda.time.DateTime.toTimeOfDay()
          Use LocalTime instead of TimeOfDay 
org.joda.time.DateTime.toYearMonthDay()
          Use LocalDate instead of YearMonthDay 
org.joda.time.DateMidnight.toYearMonthDay()
          Use LocalDate instead of YearMonthDay
